name: Clock Challenge
description:
A 60-second speed challenge!
Made for Trijam #155 in 3 hour

move the hour hand over the red hour to score a point, avoid the gears, they will reverse the movements for 2 seconds.
hurry! you have only 60 seconds to get the best score!

Controls:
tap/click on left to move the hour hand to the left
tap/click on right to move the hour hand to the right

If you'd like, post suggestions in the comments to improve the video game and your best score!

Credits:
Game engine: Construct3
Graphic: Adobe Illustrator - Photoshop
Audio sound: https://freesound.org/people/florianreichelt/sounds/459998/

Tap icon for tutorial: Tap icons created by Freepik - Flaticon
